description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Ahoy there! Pirates have boarded your console and are ready to battle it out on the high seas! Party game sporting three game modes: Open Seas, Pirate King, Mark of the Kracken. So get ready, start, sail!
